I put up code on the NEAT Users page under the question:

http://www.cs.utexas.edu/users/kstanley/neat.html#disconnected

There is a link to code for JNEAT, and another for original C++ NEAT,
that performs a mutations that connects a currently disconnected
sensor to all the outputs at once.  This code may be useful for anyone
who is looking at starting with some sensors disconnected.  

The new code is linked at the bottom of the (longish) answer to the
question. 

ken
